entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
